description: This Java class 'MoveLog' represents a move event in a game, capturing details such as the room, player, tokens, positions, dice roll, and timestamp. It is used for logging moves within a multiplayer game backend.

classes.name: MoveLog
classes.description: Entity class representing a log entry for player moves in a game room, with annotations for persistence and indexing.

methods.name: MoveLog
methods.description: Constructor for creating a MoveLog instance with specified details.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the move log.

methods.name: getPlayerColor
methods.description: Gets the color of the player who made the move.

methods.name: getTokenIndex
methods.description: Retrieves the index of the token that moved.

methods.name: getFromPosition
methods.description: Gets the position the token moved from.

methods.name: setFromPosition
methods.description: Sets the position the token moved from.

methods.name: getToPosition
methods.description: Gets the position the token moved to.

methods.name: setToPosition
methods.description: Sets the position the token moved to.

methods.name: getDiceValue
methods.description: Retrieves the dice value used for the move, if any.

methods.name: setDiceValue
methods.description: Sets the dice value for the move.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the move log was created.
